_purpose: Enables self-organization, adaptation, growth beyond anchor
_note: This file is created and modified by the system. It can override anchor.json based on evolution_policy.

identity_evolution._description: Evolved identity parameters (if different from anchor)
identity_evolution._note: Empty means no evolution yet, using anchor values

operational_adaptations._note: System can modify these based on context, task, learning

knowledge_bases._note: System can add repositories, project contexts, domain expertise

emergent_parameters._note: System can add entirely new parameters not in anchor

evolution_history._note: Tracks how system has evolved from anchor
